column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Because of the time that we showed up
column2: about 10 minutes after we sat down
column3: the kitchen made its last call
column4: so we quickly got in our food order: I had the Pork Belly Poutine and my friend had the Bosscat Burger. Both dishes were amazing! The poutine is a nice twist on the Canadian staple
column6: mingling with the squeaky cheese and savory pork belly. The burger was also bursting with flavour
